name: UnderWater (itch) (Kustt)
description:
In this game you are a man that tries to have the most meters swan in the ocean.Of course its not that easy because there are obstacles.You have a oxigen bar that indicates the air left(health).You can shoot bubbles of air to destroy the obstacles that you cant avoid.There are many other bubbles that can heal,damage,slow,speed or even freeze you.Ive made this game in 3 days for a game jam.
Good luck!
